function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Creation of urban heat islands uhis due to greenhouse gas production and urbanization","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Local-scale variation in uhi intensity due to urban geometry","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Climate change leading to increased health burden","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased risk of urban mosquito-borne diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urbanization leading to higher environmental challenges for human health","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in global average temperature","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of impacts of climate change","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impacts of climate change on human health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relocation of health care personnel hcp to new aiirs","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Sharing devices and equipment among hcp","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Comparison and publication of infection rates","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Pressure differentials not maintained in aiirs","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unintended door opening in temporary aiirs","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate negative pressure in patient rooms and anterooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear guidelines for pressure differentials and air changes per hour","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate maintenance and monitoring of negative air machines","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious particles from isolation rooms into the corridor due to lack of anterooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective design and construction of anterooms leading to difficulty in using ppe and disinfecting medical devices","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate size of anterooms leading to insufficient space for health care workers to operate","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate number of aiirs airborne infection isolation rooms for severely affected covid-19 patients","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate room size and equipment for critical covid-19 patients requiring extracorporeal membrane oxygenation, mechanical ventilation, or continuous renal replacement therapy","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of anterooms for partitioning to create additional aiirs","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Shortage of medical resources including medical personnel, medicine, and equipment","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Shortage of airborne-infection isolation rooms aiirs for covid-19 patients","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need for rapid expansion of aiir capacity to prevent infection spread to medical personnel and other patients","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient analysis or prediction of virus transmission risks at an architectural scale","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on post-evaluation of known outbreak cases for understanding virus transmission risks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited understanding of complex human-building interactions and their impact on virus transmission","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of viruses due to human interaction and movement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and visualization of virus contamination in the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate visualization of virus transmission behaviors and impacts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of longitudinal overview in 3d situated visualization","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Effects of randomness in human behaviors not adequately addressed","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Complex simulation parameters overwhelming non-expert users","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limitation in intuitive comparison of multiple simulation outputs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Incorporating relationships between occupants’ behaviors and virus transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on existing data may lead to overestimation of simulation validity and not account for behavioral influences.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of detailed exploration of human-building interactions in simulation tools.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Embedding contextual information in 3d building models may lead to inaccurate simulation of occupant behaviors and interactions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of trust in virtual human agency and simulated human behaviors may result in skepticism and resistance to using the system for evaluating designs.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in manually adjusting behavior-generating parameters for simulations with many occupants may lead to inefficiency and potential errors.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simulated results from occsim are not yet validated","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Failure to consider airflow in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of crowd behavior model in the simulation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to lack of knowledge about virus transmission","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of transparency in space occupancy and safety","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning schedules and signage locations based solely on who guidelines, without consideration of simulated contamination frequency.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of virus transmission among building occupants.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Suboptimal placement of air cleaners without consideration of simulated data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to inadequate space utilization strategies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
